permit.area_supervisor: Floors and overhead swept clean of combustibles.

safety_measures.clean_area: Floors and overhead swept clean of combustibles.
safety_measures.combustible_movement: Combustibles and vulnerable equipment moved to a distance of at least 50 feet protected by fire resistant covers. Covers containing asbestos not permitted.
safety_measures.flammable_removal: Floor and wall openings covered or plugged by fire resistant covers.
safety_measures.openings_covered: Floor and wall openings covered or plugged by fire resistant covers.
safety_measures.supply_lines_purged: Supply lines purged of all combustibles and flammable liquids and/or gases.
safety_measures.ducts_shutdown: When working on ducts all fans shut down and dampers closed.
safety_measures.fire_watch: Fire watch provided for at least 2 hours after welding is completed including patrol of floors above and below.
safety_measures.fire_watch_equipment: Fire watch supplied with extinguishing equipment
safety_measures.dust_collectors_shutdown: All dust collectors shutdown and dampers
